name: rls_policy_always_true
title: RLS Policy Always True
description: Detects RLS policies that use overly permissive expressions like \`USING (true)\` or \`WITH CHECK (true)\` for UPDATE, DELETE, or INSERT operations. SELECT policies with \`USING (true)\` are intentionally excluded as this pattern is often used deliberately for public read access.
detail: Table `public.dna_branches` has an RLS policy `Users can manage dna_branches for their workspaces` for `ALL` that allows unrestricted access (USING clause is always true). This effectively bypasses row-level security for -.
metadata:
{"name":"dna_branches","qual":null,"type":"table","roles":["-"],"schema":"public","command":"ALL","with_check":"(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM public.brands b
  WHERE ((b.id = dna_branches.brand_id) AND (b.workspace_id IN ( SELECT workspace_members.workspace_id
           FROM public.workspace_members
          WHERE (workspace_members.user_id = auth.uid()))))))","policy_name":"Users can manage dna_branches for their workspaces","permissive_using":true,"permissive_with_check":false}
cache_key: rls_policy_always_true_public_dna_branches_Users can manage dna_branches for their workspaces

name: auth_leaked_password_protection
title: Leaked Password Protection Disabled
description: Leaked password protection is currently disabled.
detail: Supabase Auth prevents the use of compromised passwords by checking against HaveIBeenPwned.org. Enable this feature to enhance security.
